column4: can you give me some advise howto update my old pc kernel (ubuntu 6.06 with out internet)
tank you,  my old pc just 128M ram .so i

you'd be surprised how well an old machine can run modern Linux if it has lots of memory.  8.04 runs really well on a Pentium II with 384 MB.  and RAM is really cheap these days.  if you can upgrade your memory, do so.
